pages.text: Feeding Troughs, when supplied with food, will feed nearby animals as if fed by a player. Animals that feed from the trough may need more than one bit of food before entering 'love mode'. Animals bred this way won't produce XP. This block is treated as a fence for animals
Do note that if there are more than 32 animals in a 10-block radius of the trough, animals will still eat but never breed.
